sentences.sContent: Cash was taken during a burglary of the apartment.
sentences.sCn: 在一次公寓盗窃案中现金被盗。

sentences.sContent: There are similar charges if you want to cash a cheque or withdraw money at a branch other than your own.
sentences.sCn: 如果你在其他银行兑现支票或支取现金，将会产生差不多的手续费。

sentences.sContent: ...It is calculated by estimating the share of a company's value that cannot be accounted for by its current products and cash flow...
...the abstraction of the idea of cash makes me uneasy...
...for instance, you don't go and stand at any kind of cash register when you decide to pay...
...Their retirement savings and home values fell sharply at the worst possible time: just before they needed to cash out...
...cautious with cash flow and extremely attentive to what customers want...
...Display and sales restrictions: California has a rule prohibiting alcohol displays near the cash registers in gas stations...
...credit cards and unlimited cash to do what he wants when he wants to...

phrases.pCn: 现金流转表，现金流量表

trans.tranOther: money in the form of coins or notes rather than cheques,  credit card s  etc
